portfolio.title: Books List
portfolio.description: A simple app to keep track of the books you’ve read, want to read, or are currently reading. Explore lists, organize your library, and stay on top of your reading goals.

portfolio.title: Chat Room
portfolio.description: A casual chat app where you can jump into conversations with just your Google account. No hassle, just quick and easy chatting.

portfolio.title: Portfolio Xhoi Ibra v.1
portfolio.description: This personal portfolio site showcases my work, skills, and projects. A little space on the web that’s all about what I do and what I’m passionate about.
